mapper.select: SELECT BN_ID, BN_TYPE, BN_ORDER, BN_NAME, BN_DESCRIPTION, BN_LINK, BN_NEW_WIN, BN_START_DATE, BN_END_DATE, BN_USE, BN_EXT, BN_WIDTH, BN_HEIGHT, BN_TOP, BN_LEFT, BN_THUMB, BN_DISPLAY_TYPE, REG_DT, REG_ID, UPD_DT, UPD_ID FROM COM_BANNER WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' AND BN_USE = '1' AND BN_TYPE = 'POPUP' AND (BN_START_DATE IS NULL OR BN_START_DATE <= NOW()) AND (BN_END_DATE IS NULL OR BN_END_DATE >= NOW()) ORDER BY BN_ORDER ASC, REG_DT DESC
